participant_1.background:
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
I'd rather avoid conflict, but I'm ready to defend myself if I need to.
i work as a trauma surgeon.
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
i own a chevy tahoe.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with a hot cup of coffee to keep me going through the heat.
i eat out more than three times a week.
I am happy with my parents.
I enjoy spending time with my loved ones and being active.
I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit.

content.text: I'm just working on a new short story. I'm a writer and I like to write about my travels.
That sounds really cool! What's your favorite place you've ever been?
I really loved the time I spent in the Amazon rainforest. It was so peaceful and beautiful.
I bet that was amazing! I've never been to the Amazon, but I've always wanted to go.
You should! It's really something else.
Yeah, I'll have to put it on my list.
What do you do for work?
I'm a personal trainer. I love helping people get fit and healthy.
That's awesome! I need to get more active.
You should! It's really good for your mental and physical health.
I know, I know. I'll start going to the gym again.
Good! I'll help you get started.
